website_summaries.verdict: Resourceful study guide that offers studying advice, practice questions, and basic information.
pros: Good overview of the process of preparing for the ASWB Clinical Exam, hitting on a variety of topics
Provides advice on how to study, as well as test-taking strategies
cons: Doesn't delve deeply into any particular topic

customer_reviews.title: Great Book For a Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with this study guide. I felt it was organized well and the information presented was helpful. I loved the inexpensive book price. The shipment response time was great! I received my book in less than 4days..Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: lynne ivery

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Study Guide!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The guide is excellent! It is concise and very clear. Love the explanations and tips. It's perfect! Its very hard to try and study every day (virtually impossible), so the guide provides a great blueprint with tools to pass the test. I am very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon White

customer_reviews.title: Read the book.
customer_reviews.text: study guide content is good. Questions are close to the Aswb test. I’ve taken the test last year and bought this study guide to refresh myself on content and to have mock exams for practice to retake.
customer_reviews.author: THudson

customer_reviews.title: Great resource
customer_reviews.text: I really do think the study guide is a great resource. I've almost completed the study guide and plan to complete it tomorrow. I have utilized other study guides and materials and this one is really helping increase my understanding. Things are explained and broken down in a very simplistic way! This study guide is well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a sufficient study guide
customer_reviews.text: Book is not well written. I do not believe it is written by Social workers or those who have even taken the exam. The wording is repetitive and non-specific. Whole sentences are repeated multiple times throughout different chapters. You may be better off taking a prep course from a social worker or at least study materials from one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: This book was helpful for studying for my test. I like how it's broken into sections for review. Has test questions at the end of each question and then a big practice test at the end. Easy to read and use.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: ASWB Clinical Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: The ASWB Clinical Study Guide is a very comprehensive guide. It includes all the theorists, and DSM 5. I find the study questions very helpful. I recommend this Study Guide for anyone preparing for the LMSW or LCSW exam.
customer_reviews.author: Booker

customer_reviews.title: This was a very useful guide as it contained that knowledge based information required ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a very useful guide as it contained that knowledge based information required when taking the exam in addition to test taking tips. I also found it very convenient that it was in electronic form and that I could use my kindle in accessing it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ASWB KSA perfected
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for this guide! Your study guide is the best of the 5 I purchased from Amazon. It follows the Knowledge, Skills and Abilities from the ASWB. Thank you for this great study guide written in a format that gives the content without any fluff.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Keaton

customer_reviews.title: Very self explanatory.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to grasp. No worries with complicated words. Recommends for social workers with English as a second language also. Comes with questions and answers with rational which is a super plus. Already recommended to colleagues who are looking to take Clinical exam. Good book
customer_reviews.author: Get over it

customer_reviews.title: The book is not like most study guides with so much information that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I rate this booklet at a 5 because it is very concise and takes out all the fluff; which makes studying the material easier. The study guide helps in breaking the material down in an understandable way. The book is not like most study guides with so much information that it makes studying overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda F. Yarborough

customer_reviews.title: Some sections however I never seen covered in any other exam prep so that is good! Also the practice test was extremely helpful
customer_reviews.text: I think some sections required more details. Some sections however I never seen covered in any other exam prep so that is good! Also the practice test was extremely helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Briana Findley

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I feel much more confident about taking ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I feel much more confident about taking the LCSW exam since I have been studying with this guide!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Archer

customer_reviews.title: Helped prepare for 2017 ASWB exam
customer_reviews.text: Good addition to other study materials. It reviews major areas of knowledge, skills and abilities needed to study for the ASWB exam. This edition may need to be updated for 2018 changes to the exam announced by ASWB.
customer_reviews.author: Teri

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, detailed overview/review and training how to answer the test questions. Great review! Helpful test prep for teaching how to clinically answer questions.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Leonas

customer_reviews.title: Great guide!
customer_reviews.text: This study guide is very helpful and easy to follow. I especially love the study guide broken up into parts and practice questions after each section.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: This a helpful study guide!!!
customer_reviews.text: I think that this study guide is easy to read and comprehend. It is very thorough and answered all of my questions and concerns regarding the clinical exam. It is a grade "A" test prep manual.
customer_reviews.author: Andre' Monday

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Guide!
customer_reviews.text: I felt it was very thorough and covered a range of topics, but also was not too overwhelming!
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Khatami

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: it’s very useful tool, breaking down the key sections of the exam , generally user friendly but does lack readability in terms of how it’s divided , I would have preferred exam questions mixed together
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps memorize broad concepts
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s quite synthesized to help students gain full understanding and memorize quickly
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: What's most important to know.
customer_reviews.text: I found the study guide was presented in a more of a conversational tone instead of a text book format. The change in tone actually allowed me to read the book faster.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Webb Larkins

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the book
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the book! It helped a lot to keep forcus on the main points to study! Also, the Boole very friendly to read! I really liked the quenstion practice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good info
customer_reviews.text: I felt like it gave me a great amount of information. I liked how the practice questions were in-depth causing me to rational out my answers.
customer_reviews.author: Roshanna L. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: The study guide provides great methods to help with my test taking because I ...
customer_reviews.text: The study guide provides great methods to help with my test taking because I have test taking anxiety. The sectional topics were very informative.
customer_reviews.author: Syrenia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great guide
customer_reviews.text: The guide was very useful and informative Was broken down into 4 categories that are easy to follow and understand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Great study guide
customer_reviews.text: Very well laid out and easy to follow study plan. Recommend highly!
customer_reviews.author: P Marshall Hollis

customer_reviews.title: This study guide covers all areas and is organized in ...
customer_reviews.text: This study guide covers all areas and is organized in a clear and consistent manner. It's easier this way to remember the complex material we need to know to pass the test..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Help to get you prepared for the exam
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to read , questions were relevant to the topic.
customer_reviews.author: B.Hieronymus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this book I wished that it had page numbers on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It looks very good and covers exactly what I need to refresh on.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Study guide was very helpful thus far for preparing for the clinical test
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Pagliari

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great study guide and I have recommended to several people
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ASWB study guide
customer_reviews.text: I like the study guide and the practice tests with rationales.
customer_reviews.author: rosie woolfolk

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The book is very helpful and contains all the information needed to pass the exam.
customer_reviews.author: Hope D. Geteles

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this study guide
customer_reviews.text: To make it easy, you can just copy and paste your testimonial which I'm copying below: It's easy to read and found it very helpful. It gives good tips when answering the exam questions.
customer_reviews.author: Elida

customer_reviews.title: Wife needed for an exam
customer_reviews.text: Wife needed this for an upcoming exam. She said this was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lee M Gordon

product_meta.title: ASWB Clinical Study Guide: Exam Review & Practice Test Questions for the Association of Social Work Boards Clinical Exam
